actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 and the National Defense Education Act of 1958 to defer payment of student loans during a period, not to exceed three years, during which the student is a participant in an accredited medical internship or residency program.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 and the National Defense Education Act of 1958 to defer payment of student loans for a period of not more than three years while the student is a participant in an accredited medical internship or residency program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 and the National Defense Education Act of 1958 to defer payment of student loans during a period, not to exceed three years, during which the student is a participant in an accredited medical internship or residency program.
